Title: Relates to prohibiting any substituted consent for a sterilization procedure
Summary: Provides that substituted consent by a guardian, health care proxy, or other third party shall not authorize a procedure resulting in sterilization in the absence of the informed consent of the person being sterilized.
LawCode: Add ยง2806-c, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to prohibiting any substituted consent for a sterilization procedure
